channel.title: Tdd on Hype-Driven Development
channel.description: Recent content in Tdd on Hype-Driven Development

item.title: Let's talk about TDD
item.description: Red Green Refactor Repeat Test Driven Development, also known as “this would be so cool if green started with an R”. So this new (as in 1957) way of programming has been catching on lately, and I’ve had to clarify many points about what TDD is and isn’t. I want to talk about some things related to my vision of TDD (which might not be yours, and that’s ok).
